entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
